body.p: Starting with version 20.0, PDF images are rendered in Author mode and PDF output. For previous versions, they are not rendered by default. However, does provide an add-on that contributes the Apache PDFBox library to offer support for rendering of PDF images.

section.title: Installing the ApachePDFBox Libraries Add-on
section.p:
offers an add-on that contributes the Apache PDFBox library for you. To install this add-on, follow these steps:
Go to Help Install new add-ons to open an add-on selection dialog box.
Enter or paste https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oxygenxml/oxygenxml.pdfimage/master/addon.xml in the Show add-ons from field.
Select the ApachePDFBox Libraries add-on and click Next.
Select the I accept all terms of the end user license agreement option and click Finish.
Restart the application.
Result: The Apache PDFBox libraries are now contributed to the Oxygen installation directory and you should be able to see PDF images in Author mode.
For more information, see the details about this ApachePDFBox Libraries add-on in GitHub.
